package.description: This package contains code associated with the following publication: Pulling Open Doors and Drawers: Coordinating an Omni-directional Base and a Compliant Arm with Equilibrium Point Control. Advait Jain and Charles C. Kemp. IEEE International Conference on Robotics and Automation (ICRA), 2010.
package.author: Advait Jain, Charles C. Kemp (Healthcare Robotics Lab, Georgia Tech)
